long_description: our own recipes, made without oil, butter, margarine; nut-free, dairy-free, sesame-free, no gmos, artificial flavours, colours or preservatives. at rivi's guilt free cookies , we've always prioritized our customers' well-being in every decision we make. since 1996, we've continually refined and improved our products to ensure they meet the highest standards. the result is a selection of delicious snacks that cater to the dietary needs of the everyday canadian consumer, providing a healthier "guilt free" treat for all.
